issue.title: [C#] ArrayData.NullCount should be a property
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ArrayData.NullCount should be a property so that it can be computed when necessary: for ex: after Slice(), NullCount is -1 and needs to be computed
